thread.title: Chrissy Teigen: John Legend and I are pregnant
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen: John Legend and I are pregnant

title: Chrissy Teigen: John Legend and I are pregnant
text:
John Legend and Chrissy Teigen are expecting their first child. (Photo: Kevin Mazur/MTV1415, WireImage)
2507 CONNECT 36 TWEET LINKEDIN 4 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Expect plenty of belly photos coming your way, because one of our favorite social media personalities is expecting her first child.
Chrissy Teigen, the supermodel, TV host and wife of singer John Legend, posted her good news on Instagram with the caption: "John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant."
John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant :) As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family. We're so excited that it's finally happening. Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx
A photo posted by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Oct 12, 2015 at 4:55pm PDT
The post went on: "As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family. "
Teigen recently opened up about her fertility struggles on her lifestyle show, FABlife .
The rest of the caption reads: "We're so excited that it's finally happening. Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx"
Legend also made the announcement on his social media accounts:
We're pregnant! https://t.co/cMKyR8VRLt
